pf.graph
Interface Edge

All Known Implementing Classes:
EdgeImpl
public interface Edge

Edge is a connection between two Vertexes in a graph. Edge is represented by Vertices where it ends. Edge also has a used flag.

Because this package is designed to work on a board with grid, edge has has a direction of edge.

Author:
Adam Juraszek
